briefTitle: Study of Zoledronic Acid for Patients With Hormone-sensitive Bone Metastases From Prostate Cancer
officialTitle: A Phase III, Parallel Group, Randomized, Open-label, Multi-centre Clinical Trial of Zoledronic Acid in Males Receiving Androgen Deprivation Therapy for Advanced Prostate Cancer.
summary: This study aims to determine whether early treatment with zoledronic acid, that is given during the early phase of advanced prostate cancer, will be more efficacious than delayed treatment

primaryOutcome.measure: Skeletal-related Event-free Survival in Men With Bone Metastases From Prostate Cancer
